item.description:
Hi Packers,

I hope you all had a great Christmas and wishing you a happy and successful new year, thank you to everyone who came to our tail gate party on December 19th, (I think we had about 70 people) it was a great day out, a special thanks to Robbie, Megan and Alisa who helped out on the day. This week we have Chicago at home, Packers Boston will be meeting on the 2nd floor at 4.15pm for the last regular season game of the season, lets make it a winning start to the new year, anyone who is not home for the holidays we hope to see you at the Banshee on Sunday.

Go Pack,

Ray Butler

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Green Bay v Chicago
